code: type Person object { public int age; public string firstName; public string lastName; function getFullName() returns string; };
type Employee object {  *Person; public float|string salary;  function getSalary() returns float|string; };

class Manager { *Employee; *Owner; public string dpt; public float salary; function init(int age, string firstName, string lastName, string status) { self.age = age; self.firstName = firstName; self.lastName = lastName; self.status = status; self.salary = 2000.0; self.dpt = "HR"; } function getFullName() returns string { return self.firstName + " " + self.lastName; } function getSalary() returns float { return self.salary; } }
